name: Motel Simulator '98
description:
Please note: this project is a prototype and save games are not yet implemented!

Congratulations!

You've recently purchased an old motel. It's a bit run down, but with a little love, maybe it can be a profitable business!

Features:
  • Dynamic customer reviews
  • Building new floors
  • Evading police investigations
  • Restocking vending machines
  • Cleaning bloody floors
  • Fully interactive office lightswitch
  • Unearthing the unspeakable secrets of the ones who came before
  • AIR CONDITIONING

If critics had been captured, bound and subjected to this game they might have called it:

"A broken mess" "Creepish" "Unfinished" "Worrying"

Awesome and spooky font is from stuffbyspencer's Fonts N' Goblins
